description: This schema validates brew formulae and casks configuration. Fully qualified formulae are written as: 'basename, tap/path/' Example: 'speedtest, teamookla/speedtest/' -> 'teamookla/speedtest/speedtest'

formulae.description: Map of section names to arrays of formulae

items.description: Formula name, optionally followed by ', ' and its tap path

casks.description: List of cask names to install

items.errorMessage: Casks array must be sorted alphabetically
